ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] some encouragement  for a humble newb
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah, a couple of things about that.  My cleric is not level 20 yet, so spells don t use much manna, especially the blasts.  I can literally cast as quickly as
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah, a couple of things about that. My cleric is not
level 20 yet, so spells don't use much manna,
especially the blasts. I can literally cast as
quickly as the interface will allow, buff, heals and
mostly blasts and have yet to see my manna go below 4
bars.

Solo my fights usually go, root, blast 20, blast 20,
root, blast 20, blast 20 until they finally break root
then 1hb 10-20, blast, 1hb 10-20, blast until the
beastie is dead. I end up with 4 bubs of manna on a
yellow con this way :)

With enough manna a cleric is actually a formidable
fighting machine /grin. Anyone who wants to duo in WC
with this cleric on Fenin Ro should look up
"bouncyfrog". I usually play on the weekends.

Quwi
--- Kittin LovesYou <KittinLovesYou@...>
wrote:
> I've run out of mana on kei. my druid (22) is
> always with kei and is the healer of the group
> (normally). She sits around and buffs and heals.
> my mage evne with kei will run out of mana with
> about 5-6 nukes and DS's. I must say, for my druid
> being on kei since the beginning of her creation,
> her med is still almost maxed, and her combat skills
> are still good. amazing waht you can do after you
> learn the game a bit better.
> Kittin
